description: Queryable names for the STAC API Item Search filter.
title: Queryables for JAXAL2Products_MAAP collection

acquisitionType.description: Used to distinguish at a high level the appropriateness of the acquisition for "general" use, whether the product is a nominal acquisition, special calibration product or other
acquisitionType.title: Acquisition type

missionPhase.description: Mission phase, each one has a specific objective for the mission. Values are mission-specific.
missionPhase.title: Mission phase

processingDate.description: A date interval requesting entries processed within a given time interval
processingDate.title: Processing date

instrument.description: The instrument (e.g. MERIS, AATSR, ASAR, HRVIR. SAR)
instrument.title: Instrument

creationDate.description: The date when the metadata item was ingested for the first time (i.e. inserted) in the catalogue
creationDate.title: Creation date

processingCenter.description: The processing center (e.g. PDHS-E, PDHS-K, DPA, F-ACRI)
processingCenter.title: Processing center

modificationDate.description: The date when the metadata item was last modified (i.e. updated) in the catalogue
modificationDate.title: Modification date

processingLevel.description: The processing level applied to the entry
processingLevel.title: Processing level

productType.description: A string identifying the entry type
productType.title: Product type

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier identifying the product (see http://www.doi.org)
doi.title: Doi
